title: Entering the House Procedure
description: This training module outlines the standard procedure for entering the house, including turning on the TV, lights, and checking the refrigerator.
transcript: Ok, so here's my process for entering my house. I come in, I open the door, I get the remote control and hit the power button on here to start up the TV. Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights. Then once I'm done with that I come over here and open the refrigerator to see if there's any food.

steps.title: Enter the House and Turn on TV
steps.description: Open the door, enter the house, locate the remote control, and press the power button to turn on the TV.

steps.title: Turn on the Lights
steps.description: Go to the light switch and turn on all the lights in the designated area.

steps.title: Check the Refrigerator
steps.description: Walk to the refrigerator and open it to check for the presence of food.
